swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.grammar

Class AGrammarSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.grammar.AGrammarSpec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectGrammar.Complete

    public abstract class AGrammarSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class for defining Grammars directly in Java.
    Usage: simply derive from this class and instantiate Terminals, NonTerminals and Productions as class members. This class creates the Grammar automatically. For an example, see ProjectGrammar
    Author:
    Gero
